Adding rich content using widgets We’ve noticed that people got very curious about one particular building block in Sprites - “Widget”. This is, indeed, the most powerful element which allows you to write arbitrary JavaScript and have it executed when the current slide is being presented to the user. With widgets, you can embed custom graphics (for example, Google Visualizations), display videos (YouTube/Vimeo), show social... 5/22/2014
